call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Community Chat - October 2nd

commitments.commitment: Shipping equipment to Colorado Springs meetup and streaming talks for those who can't attend
commitments.quote: I'm packing a box up this weekend and shipping it out to the Meetup event space in Colorado, sunny Colorado Springs

commitments.commitment: Richie will start participating more in community calls
commitments.quote: from November, he's promising to start spending in the community calls

commitments.commitment: QX will work with Glasgow to get weekly summaries back up and extract tweets
commitments.quote: So let me work with Mark or Glasgow and we'll see if we can get those back up and see if we can extract tweets from these

open_questions.question: Need to ping AnonBR about Keystone device requirements
open_questions.context: Keystone device integration waiting on AnonBR for Nautilus work

open_questions.question: Status of lithium project in Argentina with Palmyra
open_questions.context: Haven't heard about lithium project for many months

key_facts.fact: USC oracle pool version 2 launched with 4 or 5 running USC oracle pools
key_facts.speaker: Kushti

key_facts.fact: 12 oracles already in the USC oracle pool
key_facts.speaker: HQ3rr

key_facts.fact: Node version 6.0 will be activated in five days (approximately 3,000-3,500 blocks)
key_facts.speaker: Kushti

key_facts.fact: Mining reward reduction coming, going to single digits (around 9)
key_facts.speaker: Byron

key_facts.fact: Original white paper plan was to have bootstrapping entity (EF) for two and a half years, now one year past that timeline
key_facts.speaker: Kushti
